Articles.Content: Upon landing my lander on the MÃƒÂ¼n, I planted a flag. Normal business. After time warping to go to daytime, it exploded. Help?

you see, unlike other objects in the kerbal space-time continuum, the flags are highly unstable due to their specialized omega fractal makeup. under normal circumstances, they function properly, but under the effects of kerbal timewarp drives, their instability rears its ugly head. this takes the form of spontaneous combustion and explosion.
They count as their own separate ship, so they may have "crashed" into the surface.
I've managed to take one out with a rover, but never spontaneously exploded one.
Yup ive also had this happen since they were first implemented, mine happened on loading a quick save.
